meaningMnemonic: You find some <radical>fingers</radical> from <radical>long ago</radical>. They must have been <kanji>set aside</kanji> by their previous owners. They definitely weren't cut off or anything, someone just decided they didn't want them anymore and set them aside.
readingMnemonic: I know why they <kanji>set aside</kanji> their fingers long ago, it's because there was no <reading>so</reading>ap (そ). If you didn't have soap to clean your fingers you wouldn't want to keep them for very long...
